title: Simulation-Based Practical Training Course for Radiological Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational radiation theory, understanding of medical imaging equipment operations, and basic patient safety protocols
context.additional_context: Customized education utilizing VR devices and simulation software in a BYOD environment, enhancing radiation handling and error management training through scenarios resembling actual clinical settings

learning_goals: Perform radiation equipment operation procedures with 90% accuracy in a simulated environment
Identify and respond to risk factors with over 85% accuracy in VR-based patient safety scenarios
Achieve a score of 4 or higher on the evaluation scale for applying radiographic imaging protocols in team-based simulations

resources: VR Headset and Motion Tracking Equipment

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
